Class AdHocModule

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommunicationModule<AdHocModuleConfiguration>
    public class AdHocModule
extends AbstractCommunicationModule<AdHocModuleConfiguration>
    Represents the module for ad hoc communication of a simulation unit.

    • Method Detail

      • enable

        public void enable()
        Enables the AdHoc communication module with default configuration parameters. The transmission power will be obtained from the specific network simulator's configuration files.

      • enable

        public void enable​(AdHocModuleConfiguration configuration)
        Enables the AdHoc communication module with the given configuration.
        Specified by:
        enable in interface CommunicationModule<AdHocModuleConfiguration>
        Overrides:
        enable in class AbstractCommunicationModule<AdHocModuleConfiguration>
        Parameters:
        configuration - An AdHoc configuration determining the number of radios, channels, power and more.

      • disable

        public void disable()
        Disables the AdHoc communication on the vehicle.
        Specified by:
        disable in interface CommunicationModule<AdHocModuleConfiguration>

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()
        Returns whether the AdHoc communication is enabled and configured or disabled.
        Returns:
        status of AdHoc module

      • sendCam

        public Integer sendCam()
        Assembles and transmits a Cooperative Awareness Message (CAM).
        Returns:
        unique messageId of the CAM or null (in case of non-sent cam, e.g. due to deactivated network card)

      • sendV2xMessage

        public void sendV2xMessage​(V2xMessage msg)
        Description copied from interface: CommunicationModule
        Finalize the process of sending a generic V2xMessage, which has already undergone several checks to be send on the specific interface (ad hoc or cell).
        Specified by:
        sendV2xMessage in interface CommunicationModule<AdHocModuleConfiguration>
        Overrides:
        sendV2xMessage in class AbstractCommunicationModule<AdHocModuleConfiguration>
        Parameters:
        msg - V2X message to be sent

      • createMessageRouting

        public AdHocMessageRoutingBuilder createMessageRouting()
        Creates a new AdHocMessageRoutingBuilder for the adhoc module and returns it. This object can then be used to configure the routing.
        Returns:
        the created builder for further configuration
